text:
HubSpot is growing quickly, and we’re hiring for a lot of development related roles. We recently were rated second best place to work.
• <https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/2849537756/|Senior Software Engineer, CMS, Content Assets - Front End>
• <https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/2867181828|Senior Software Engineer, Developer Platform- Backend>
• <https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/2786204335|Senior Software Engineer, Marketplace - Front End>
• <https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/2810539994|Web Developer, Mid-Level>
• <https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/2813485054|Senior Marketing Manager, Developer Community (Remote)>
• <https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/2831487359|Senior Product Marketing Manager> - Focused on Developers

Some roles may vary. Id look at the job postings for detail on locations, inquire if not listed. We're a very hybrid (remote and in person) company. That said im sure we have some limits to what countries we can hire from I just do not personally know them.
I am currently living in India and looking out for senior backend engineer role.
